verses.name: Genesis 37:4
verses.text: And when his brethren saw that their father loved him more than all his brethren, they hated him, and could not speak peaceably unto him.

verses.name: Genesis 37:5
verses.text: And Joseph dreamed a dream, and he told it his brethren: and they hated him yet the more.

verses.name: Genesis 37:6
verses.text: And he said unto them, Hear, I pray you, this dream which I have dreamed:

verses.name: Genesis 37:7
verses.text: For, behold, we were binding sheaves in the field, and, lo, my sheaf arose, and also stood upright; and, behold, your sheaves stood round about, and made obeisance to my sheaf.
